  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.DataRequiredI.PullI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.DataRequiredI.PushI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, fr.upmc.components.ports.DataOutboundPortI, fr.upmc.components.ports.InboundPortI, fr.upmc.components.ports.OutboundPortI, fr.upmc.components.ports.PortI, ControlledDataRequiredI.ControlledPullI, PushModeControllingI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ProcessorDynamicStateDataOutboundPort
extends AbstractControlledDataOutboundPort
    The class ProcessorDynamicStateDataOutboundPort is the client-side port to exchange dynamic state data with a processor component.

    Description

    Outbound port used to pull or push dynamic state data from a processor or to a processor client. These ports must be connected by a ProcessorDynamicStateDataConnector.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : April 8, 2015

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
